Posts.Content: Hi I am quiet new to this forum too, but have learnt a lot from the posts I have read, it has been very helpful. I had a mastectomy 5 weeks ago and will start Tamoxifen around end of August (I am waiting for my son to go back to school).  Because of all the posts about bad reactions to it I think I am dreading it more than if they had said I needed Chemo !   My BCN said that MOST people don't get any bad side effects.   She also suggested taking Sage tablets for the sweats, apparently Christies have done trials and the Sage works well with the Tamoxifen.  So I have got the Sage ready and waiting...(Healthspan - online). I am pleased to hear that it maybe a case of finding the type of tablet that suits you personally, I am quiet prepared to work through the lot ! Hope its not as bad as you fear. S
